Entries.RobinLewd: Ah, yes! yes! I love it! /078 256 395/How nice of you, this is great. / 093 088 121 122 123 117/Oh.. Oh, how peculiar. /107 174 176 180 182 194 184 186 442/Is that a declaration of war? /446/Thanks/074 273 279 287 288/

Entries.Robin: This is for me? Wow, I absolutely love it!! Let's hang out some time, feels free to visit me anytime you want after 5 p.m!/224 426 636/Thanks! This is really nice!/-6 -79 424 709/Um... why?/16 330/What the...? This is terrible!/2/Thank you. This might come in handy.//

Entries.307009001/t 900 1700: spring_day_ambient/58 25/farmer 71 27 3 Robin 58 26 3/pause 500/animate Robin false true 500 24 25/move farmer -8 0 0/stopAnimation Robin/faceDirection Robin 2/pause 200/speak Robin "Oh, @! You just in time! I appreciate your help with my axe!"/pause 200/speak Robin "And if you're here can you help me again? Just bring this woods to my house?"/question fork1 "Would you like to help her?#Yes, for sure!#No, I have some bisiness"/fork notCurier/pause 500/speak Robin "Yay! Let's go!"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/changeLocation ScienceHouse/warp farmer 5 21/faceDirection farmer 1/warp Robin 7 21/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/speak Robin "Thank you a lot! You know me and Demetrius get along badly last time, but he made the best peach tincture I've ever taste!"/pause 500/speak Robin "Let me pay you out for your help and treat you with this tincture!"/question fork1 "Would you taste it?#Of course!#I have no time for drinking during the day!"/fork healthyBoy/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 300/message "You've tasted the tincture and it was realy good!"/pause 500/message "Moreover, seems that Robin really like peach tinctures, because she drunk almost all bottle by herself"/pause 500/message "She've got completely blitzed and started to tell you about her life and troubles with Demetrius"/pause 500/message "Suddenly..."/speak Robin "You know you're pretty cute! You're pretty strong, kind, and making the local live better with your farm."/pause 500/speak Robin "U know I wanna make something wrong but verry funny"/pause 500/question fork1 "She sat closer, and put her hand on your pants.#Do nothing#Don't do it! I'm still virgin!"/fork HaHaStupidMeMeReference/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/addMailReceived dressOff/changeSprite Robin LewDew/changePortrait Robin LewDew/addMailReceived RobinBedUsing/warp farmer 18 4/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame farmer 43/warp Robin 19 4/faceDirection Robin 3/positionOffset farmer 28 10/speak Robin "That's much better $13"/viewport 19 7/animate farmer false true 500 43/animate Robin true true 500 133 134/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/speak Robin "Is it good? Give it to me!$13"/animate Robin true true 125 133 134/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/speak Robin "O fuck! Give it ALL to me!$16"/playSound swordswipe/playSound swordswipe/speak Robin "...$17"/playSound swordswipe/playSound swordswipe/speak Robin "...$18"/playSound swordswipe/playSound swordswipe/speak Robin "...$19"/stopAnimation Robin/animate Robin true true 500 132/speak Robin "Well...$21"/speak Robin "That was realy sweet! Entries.notCurier: pause 500/speak Robin "Yeah, I see..."/pause 500/speak Robin "Well have a nice day."/end

Entries.healthyBoy: pause 500/speak Robin "Sure, I understand you've got some business, well have a nice day!"/end
Entries.HaHaStupidMeMeReference: pause 500/speak Robin "Yeah, HaHa, what a funny meme, you know what? Fuck off"/end

Entries.33/f Robin 1500/p Robin: jaunty/5 17/farmer 6 24 0 Robin 5 17 3/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 200/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "Hi @. I was just cleaning some dust off my saw."/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "$q 66 null#Have you ever made anything out of wood, @?#$r 66 50 event_wood1#Yes#$r 66 50 event_wood2#No"/pause 500/speak Robin "I think we've become good enough friends that I can trust you with my carpentry secrets!$h#$b#Here, let me show you the blueprints."/move Robin 2 0 1/pause 600/playSound openBox/pause 600/move Robin -2 0 2/pause 400/playMusic none/playSound coin/pause 1500/playSound reward/addCraftingRecipe Flute Block/addCraftingRecipe Drum Block/message "Learned how to craft 'Flute Block' and 'Drum Block'"/pause 700/speak Robin "You can use these to get creative on your farm. #$b#It feels good to be able to decorate your house with things you've made yourself!$h"/pause 700/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/message "You've almost leaved carpenter's shop, but suddenly a log falled down on you from the shelf"/pause 100/playSound woodyHit/pause 100/speak Robin "Oh No, @! How are you?! Come here let me look on you"/pause 100/message "She brought you at lab and checked your status"/speak Robin "Yeah, nothing serious, You've scared me!"/pause 100/question fork1 "#Actualy I could die! I need compensation!#Yeah that was unexpectable, be sure to make it safier!"/fork mumbleBaby/pause 500/speak Robin "I see, I think I can do something..."/pause 500/message "She sat next to you and started to unzip your pants"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/addMailReceived dressOff/changeSprite Robin LewDew/changePortrait Robin LewDew/changeSprite Robin LewDew/changePortrait Robin LewDew/warp farmer 21 22/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame farmer 43/warp Robin 22 22/faceDirection Robin 3/positionOffset farmer 28 10/speak Robin "That's much better $13"/viewport 14 18/animate farmer false true 500 43/animate Robin true true 500 133 134/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/pause 1000/playSound slimeHit/speak Robin "Is it good? Give it to me!$13"/animate Robin true true 125 133 134/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/pause 250/playSound slimeHit/speak Robin "O fuck! Entries.307009000: Basic/Peach for tincture/Robin asked me for a peach to make a special tincture by her grandpa recipe./Enter Robin's house with a peach anytime you can./-1/-1/0/-1/true

Entries.307009003/f Robin 2000/t 600 930/d Tue W: continue/64 15/farmer 64 16 2 Robin 64 18 0/pause 1500/addQuest 307009000/skippable/speak Robin "Hi @! I came to aske you for a favour.$h#$b#I've found an old grandpa recipe of peach tincture"/pause 200/speak Robin "So... Can you bring a peach for me?#$b#You don't have to... but if you do it, we'll make tincture together!#$b#Well, I hope you'll help me. Bye."/pause 300/end
